fix_zindex.label: Control the stacking order of sections
fix_zindex.info: Increase or decrease the z-index value to control the visual layering of sections, ensuring the desired display arrangement when using negative spacing. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8310188-z-index-settings)

look_position.label: Position
look_position.info: This is the position of the add to cart button that will appear in the banner.

title.label: Heading
title.info: To add an underline, select the text and press Ctrl + U for Windows and Linux or Cmd + U for Mac.

secondary_font_gradient.label: Secondary font in accent gradient color

link_text.label: Label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - accessibility.

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Icon uses primary button color for accents.

show_accessibility.label: Show accessibility mode toggle in header
show_accessibility.info: Enable this toggle to show more contrast and larger fonts to your visitors.

enable_accessibility_default.label: Enable accessibility mode by default
enable_accessibility_default.info: This hides the toggle in the header and shows accessibility mode always.

rtl.label: Enable RTL text direction
rtl.info: Arabic, Hebrew and Persian are the most widespread RTL writing systems in modern times. Online stores in RTL language are recommended to enable this setting. [Learn more ](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208028-accessibility)

logo_width.label: Logo width
logo_width.info: To keep the header layout as optimized as possible, the logo has a maximum height of 130px.

mobile_logo.label: Mobile logo image
mobile_logo.info: Leave empty if you want to use the same logo as uploaded for desktop. The logo is always centered on mobile.

logo_width_mobile.label: Mobile logo width
logo_width_mobile.info: To keep the header layout as optimized as possible, the logo has a maximum height of 88px.

width.label: Content maximum width
width.info: When you choose 2000px, the content will be full width.

primary_bg_gradient.label: Primary background gradient
primary_bg_gradient.info: Primary background gradient replaces primary background color where possible.

title_color_gradient.label: Headings gradient
title_color_gradient.info: Headings gradient replaces headings color where possible.

accent_gradient.label: Accent gradient
accent_gradient.info: Accent gradient replaces accent color where possible.

default_color_scheme.label: Default color scheme
default_color_scheme.info: This color scheme will be used for all sections and pages that don't have a specific color scheme set.

dropdown_color.label: Menus and drawers
dropdown_color.info: This is the color scheme of your mega menu or dropdown menu. Mobile menu, search drawer, side cart, filters, shop the look drawer, quickshop cart, other drawers and dropdowns will automatically use this color scheme.

product_label.paragraph: Click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8789852-products) for information about adding labels.

fonts.paragraph: Not all font families support multiple font weights.

custom_fonts.paragraph: Custom fonts can be added in two ways: by uploading a font file or by using an Adobe font snippet. [More info](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8817864-typography-and-custom-fonts)

custom_primary_font_file.label: Custom primary font file
custom_primary_font_file.info: Upload your font file in the 'Files' section of your Shopify admin.

custom_primary_font_snippet.label: Custom primary font snippet
custom_primary_font_snippet.info: The snippet looks like this: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/abc123.css">

custom_secondary_font_file.label: Custom secondary font file
custom_secondary_font_file.info: Upload your font file in the 'Files' section of your Shopify admin.

custom_secondary_font_snippet.label: Custom secondary font snippet
custom_secondary_font_snippet.info: The snippet looks like this: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/abc123.css">

global_title_size.label: Default heading font size
global_title_size.info: Applicable to static pages like the account login and register pages.

enable_hyphens.label: Enable hyphens
enable_hyphens.info: This will add hyphens to long words to prevent them from breaking the layout.

multiply.paragraph: Apply this effect on your product or collection images, it will hide the white background. Recommended when using a colored general background and images with a white background.

multiply_product_images.label: Pass through colors on product images

options__3.label: Enable pass through with a background color

multiply_product_images_color_palette.label: Pass through colors on product images background color

multiply_collection_images.label: Pass through colors on collection images

options__3.label: Enable pass through with a background color

multiply_collection_images_color_palette.label: Pass through colors on collection images background color

everything_rounded.label: Show all images with round corners

enable_cart_drawer.label: Enable cart drawer
enable_cart_drawer.info: When adding products to the cart or when clicking the cart icon in the header, this will open a cart side drawer instead of redirecting to the cart page.

enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove.label: Enable undo deleted products
enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove.info: Enable this if you want to give a visitor the option if a product is removed, it can be undone.

enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove_delay.label: Enable timer for undo deleted products
enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove_delay.info: This will show the undo feature for a certain amount of seconds.

enable_cart_drawer_upsell_complementary.label: Show cart complementary products
enable_cart_drawer_upsell_complementary.info: Products can be selected in Shopify's Search & Discovery app.

enable_cart_drawer_upsell_variants.label: Show variant picker
enable_cart_drawer_upsell_variants.info: Not applicable for products with more than 250 variants.

show_trustbadge.label: Show secure and safe checkout trustbadge
show_trustbadge.info: It will be shown automatically in the cart drawer, cart page and it can also be added as a block on the productpage and on the featured product section.

trustbadge_custom_image.label: Custom image
trustbadge_custom_image.info: Upload your own custom secure image to show next to the secure & safe checkout text. .png or .svg file recommended.

search_drawer_popular_collections_title.label: Heading
search_drawer_popular_collections_title.info: Promote popular collections and/or important products when search bar is empty.

show_stock_label.label: Show 'Last stock!' on products
show_stock_label.info: When stock is running low on a product, inform your visitors about this. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208038-products)

stock_label_qty.label: Stock level to show ‘Last stock!’ label

show_price_varies.label: Show price range on product cards
show_price_varies.info: When different variants of a product have a different price range, this will show on your product card.

product_custom_label.label: Metafield: custom label
product_custom_label.info: Create a metafield for a custom label and enter the namespace and key here (e.g. custom.label) [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208038-products)

show_product_stock_qty.label: Stock level to show available product stock
show_product_stock_qty.info: You can also check 'always show available product stock' below to override this.

show_product_rating.label: Show product ratings
show_product_rating.info: The ratings will be automatically pulled from your review app.

show_preorder.label: Show pre-order button
show_preorder.info: This shows a pre-order button as buy button. Only applicable when product has 'continue selling when out of stock' setting active.

product_short_description.label: Show product short description
product_short_description.info: Show a part of the product description or use a custom text.

product_short_description_text.label: Metafield: custom short description
product_short_description_text.info: Create a metafield for a custom short description and enter the namespace and key here (e.g. custom.short_description) [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208038-products)

product_titles_caps.label: Show product titles in ALL CAPS

color_swatch_name.label: Color swatches name
color_swatch_name.info: The option name used for the color swatches, for example 'Color' or 'Colour'. You can add multiple names by entering each on a separate line.

color_swatch_hexes.label: Custom colors
color_swatch_hexes.info: For each color: enter on a separate line the name of the color, then a colon (:) followed by the hex code (for example: Red: #DC143C). Leave out the hex code to use a custom image instead.

color_swatches_variant_image.label: Show variant images instead of colors on productcards

enable_free_shipping.label: Enable free shipping
enable_free_shipping.info: Note that this feature does not work well when multi-currency is enabled. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208035-shipping-and-delivery)

free_shipping_amount.label: Minimum order amount to free shipping

deliverytime.paragraph: Use metafields to show product delivery times. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208035-shipping-and-delivery)
deliverytime.paragraph__2: Do you want to show default deliverytimes for products where no delivery time-metafield is set up? Enter them below.

default_product_deliverytime_info.label: Default extra info for deliverytime
default_product_deliverytime_info.info: This will show an info icon next to your delivery- and shipping messages on productcards and productpage. The text will show in a popup.

show_deliverytime_always.label: Show delivery time for products without inventory tracking
show_deliverytime_always.info: When inventory tracking is disabled for a product, the 'in stock' delivery time will be shown.

shipping_timer.paragraph: If you handle ‘same day shipping’, show a timer how much time visitors have left to order your products to be shipped today.

shipping_timer_show_until.label: Before what time should your customers order?

shipping_timer_show_from.label: Starting from what time should the timer show up on your page?

shipping_timer_show_unavailable.label: Show shipping timer when product is unavailable

shipping_timer.paragraph__2: On which days do you want to show the timer?

settings.paragraph: You can set up your social links in the ['Brand' page](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/managing-brand-assets) in the Shopify settings, but you can also choose to connect them here.

newsletter_popup_testmode.label: Enable test mode
newsletter_popup_testmode.info: This shows the popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing the popup. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

age_verify_popup_testmode.label: Enable test mode
age_verify_popup_testmode.info: This shows the popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing the popup. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

age_verify_popup_cookie_text.label: Cookies text (optional)
age_verify_popup_cookie_text.info: The text will automatically be shown to visitors when this is obliged. Make sure you have enabled 'Limit tracking for customers in Europe'. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/your-account/privacy/cookies#tracking-european-customers-and-gdpr-compliance)

denied.paragraph: This will display when the customer has declined the age verification.

show_cookiebanner.label: Show cookie banner/popup
show_cookiebanner.info: The cookie banner or popup will automatically be shown to visitors when this is obliged, and if no age verification popup is enabled. Make sure you have enabled 'Limit tracking for customers in Europe'. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/your-account/privacy/cookies#tracking-european-customers-and-gdpr-compliance)

cookiebanner_testmode.label: Enable test mode
cookiebanner_testmode.info: This shows the banner/popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

cookiebanner_image.label: Image in the cookie popup
cookiebanner_image.info: Only applicable in the popup version of the cookie banner. (580 x 540px .png recommended)

cookiebanner_title.label: Heading
cookiebanner_title.info: Only applicable in the popup version of the cookie banner.

cookiebanner_text.label: Text
cookiebanner_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

custom_script_for_head.label: Custom script for head tag
custom_script_for_head.info: This setting allows you to insert scripts into the head tag of the theme code.

custom_script_for_body.label: Custom script for body tag
custom_script_for_body.info: This setting allows you to insert scripts into the body tag of the theme code.

settings.paragraph:
Turn every image banner across the entire store into a shop the look banner simply by adding 
products in the banner settings. A drawer will open with the selected productcards

shop_the_look_items.label: Products per row
shop_the_look_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8789841-shop-the-look)

custom_height.label: Custom height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom height’ is enabled.

custom_height_mobile.label: Custom height
custom_height_mobile.info: Only applicable when ‘custom height’ is enabled.

cols.label: Columns
cols.info: If columns per row '4' is selected, values above 4 will be ignored.

height.info: Based on the first banner in each row.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

image_move.label: Show move animation on hover on banner
image_move.info: Not applicable when 'Space between banners' is less than 10px.

show_content_on_hover.label: Show content on hover on banner images

content_on_hover_color_palette.label: Color scheme on hover on banner images

height.info: Based on the first image/video in each row.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

settings.paragraph: Customize your content using blocks. The positon will be automatically optimized for mobile.

image.label: Cover image (optional)
image.info: Select an image to play the video in a popup, leave blank to play video on the page. 760 x 570px recommended.

settings.paragraph: Customize your content using blocks. The positon will be automatically optimized for mobile.

video_url.label: Video URL
video_url.info: Accepts Vimeo or YouTube links. You can also upload or select a video from your media library by using the 'Video' setting below.

video_alt_text.label: Video URL alt text
video_alt_text.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

image_before.label: Before image
image_before.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6686981-section-image-comparison)

image_after.label: After image
image_after.info: Make sure the dimension match the before image.

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208057-section-collection-list)

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208057-section-collection-list)

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_in_circle.label: Show images in circle
show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when image ratio is set to 100%.

image.label: Image
image.info: Slideshow can be used in three different layouts. For more information and recommended image sizes [click here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208058-section-slideshow).

product.label: Product (optional)
product.info: Select a product or the content can be filled below.

content.paragraph: Only applicable when there is no product selected.

settings.paragraph: The following inputs are required for the form to submit successfully: Email and either a Message or Text input.
You can fill in maximum 6 options. If you want less options, fill in less. Not all 6 are required.
You can fill in maximum 6 options. If you want less options, fill in less. Not all 6 are required.

image.label: Background image
image.info: For best results with full background setting, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208060-section-counters)

numbers_accent_color.label: Show the counter digits in accent color

countdown_start.label: Start date + time
countdown_start.info: When do you want the countdown timer to start? Before this time, the banner will not be shown.

number_of_items.label: Logos per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more logos than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208061-section-logo-list)

image_svg.label: Use .svg format
image_svg.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

image.label: Background image (optional)
image.info: For best results with full background setting, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208062-section-newsletter)

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208063-section-recently-viewed-products)

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

number_of_items.label: Blog posts per row
number_of_items.info: From 5 blog posts it generates another layout. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208065-section-blog-posts)

big_first_item.label: Make first image full height
big_first_item.info: If checked, the image of the first article will stretch to the full height of the container on desktop.

content_width.label: Content width
content_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the content will be full width. Image/video width can be selected separately within the block settings.

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Icon uses highlight color for accents.

image_svg.label: Use .svg format
image_svg.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

author.label: Author
author.info: Leave blank when the author is anonymous.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208069-section-featured-collection)

text_alignment.label: Heading position
text_alignment.info: If ‘Next to the products’ is selected, it shows a max of 3 products per row.

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208069-section-featured-collection)

text_alignment.label: Heading position
text_alignment.info: If ‘Next to the products’ is selected, it shows a max of 3 products per row.

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

faq_question.label: Heading
faq_question.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Icon uses highlight color for accents.

header_image_svg.label: Use .svg format
header_image_svg.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

content.paragraph: All content can be filled static or with metafields. All content can be used seperate or together in this block. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208042-productpage)

show_contact_form.label: Show contact form
show_contact_form.info: A standard contact form will appear below the content.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

custom_html_snippet.label: Custom HTML
custom_html_snippet.info: Add app snippets, embed code or other HTML code to create advanced customizations.

color_palette_banners.label: Banners color scheme
color_palette_banners.info: Only applicable for the first banner and for banners with a background.

enable_content.label: Show content on image
enable_content.info: This will override the first banner.

mobile_height.info: Only applicable when the first banner is not visible.

product.label: Product
product.info: Select a product or the content can be filled below.

settings.paragraph: The announcement bar will remain visible in the theme editor after clicking the 'close' icon. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208055-header-settings)

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Layout 7 and 8 do not show the menu button, more information on header layouts can be found [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8789865-header-settings).

options__2.label: Logo left, menubar, variant extended search

options__3.label: Logo left, menubar, compact search right

options__4.label: Logo left, menubar, extended search right

options__5.label: Logo left, in-header navigation, compact search

options__8.label: Logo center, in-header navigation, compact search

width.label: Width
width.info: When you choose 2000px, the header will be full width.

header_icons.label: Show text instead of icons
header_icons.info: The account icon, cart icon, compact search icon, currency selector and language selector (if used) will be replaced with text.

navbar_menu_item_text.label: Extra menu item in top bar

information.paragraph: Add information using blocks in the sections area.

searchbar_width.label: Search bar width
searchbar_width.info: Not applicable for a centered search bar or compact search icon. When you choose 600px, the search bar will be full width.

sticky.label: Sticky header or menu
sticky.info: Sticky menu is only applicable when a layout with menubar is enabled and 'Enable scroll effect' is disabled.

menu_scroll.label: Enable scroll effect
menu_scroll.info: Only applicable when 'Alignment menu items' is set to 'Left'.

show_dropdown_images.label: Show collection images in menus
show_dropdown_images.info: Show the collection image before the title.

show_dropdown_images_autofill.label: Auto-fill collection images
show_dropdown_images_autofill.info: Automatically use the first product images when missing the collection image.

show_dropdown_images_rounded.label: Show collection images in a circle

custom_menu_items_per_columns.label: Custom menu items per column
custom_menu_items_per_columns.info: By default, the items in the megamenu will be divided into columns based but this can be overruled by setting a custom number of items per column below.

menu_items_limit.label: Menu items per column
menu_items_limit.info: Note that submenu items will not be divided into separate columns.

submenu_items_limit.label: Submenu items per column
submenu_items_limit.info: The last submenu items will be followed by a 'show more' link in the megamenu

enable_socials.label: Show social media accounts
enable_socials.info: For more info on how to connect your social media accounts click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208055-header-settings).

enable_button.info: By default the button will link to the login page and will overrule the account icon, but this behaviour can be overruled by adding a custom link to the button.

button_url.label: Link (optional)
button_url.info: This will overrule the button link to the login page.

spacing_mobile.info: Only applicable for non-transparent header and when the first section is not a full width section or breadcrumbs.

liquid.label: Custom Liquid
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

usp.label: Heading
usp.info: When the line of text is longer than a mobile screen width can handle, it will show a ‘more info’ link that opens a popup. Wrap your text between | to use accent color. For example: Heading |continued| text.

show_mobile.label: Use this menu in mobile navigation

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Copy and paste the name of an item created in your menu to create a dropdown menu. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8789865-header-settings#h_4fb96ad5c6)

layout.label: Banner layout
layout.info: Only applicable when both banners are enabled.

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Copy and paste the name of an item created in your menu to create a dropdown menu. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8789865-header-settings#h_4fb96ad5c6)

bottom_img.label: Image
bottom_img.info: A logo or a trustmark is commonly used for the footer bottombar.

enable_country_selector.label: Show country selector
enable_country_selector.info: Make sure 'show country selector' is enabled in the header settings.

enable_language_selector.label: Show language selector
enable_language_selector.info: Make sure 'show language selector' is enabled in the header settings.

enable_follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on Shop
enable_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

split_menu.label: Split menu
split_menu.info: This will show a large menu in two parts, the other blocks will always be shown first.

enable_follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on Shop
enable_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

customer_support_img.label: Image
customer_support_img.info: For best results use an image with a max. width of 320px.

extra_customer_support.label: Text
extra_customer_support.info: Do you want to show any other info about your company? You can show the opening hours, for example.

settings.paragraph: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products#recommendation-logic)

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Create a menu containing all of your info pages. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/collections/3431583-theme-xtra-2-0-for-shopify-manuals)

show_login_links.label: Show sign in and register links for customers

show_maps_url.label: Show a link to Google Maps after the address

google_maps_iframe.label: Google Maps embed code
google_maps_iframe.info: Show your shops' location in Google Maps. You can find the embed code by searching your store in Google Maps, clicking 'Share' and then choosing 'Embed a map'. [Learn more](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/144361)

enable.label: Enable sticky add to cart bar
enable.info: Not applicable for products with more than 250 variants.

hide_in_theme_editor.label: Hide sticky add to cart bar in the theme editor

pros_and_cons.paragraph: Pros and cons can be setup with metafields. More information on metafields and this feature can be found [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208042-productpage).

specifications.paragraph: Product specifications can be setup with metafields. More information on metafields and this feature can be found [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208042-productpage).

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

custom_html_snippet.label: Custom HTML
custom_html_snippet.info: Add app snippets, embed code or other HTML code to create advanced customizations.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Title is only applicable as a block when used ‘right’.

title.label: Custom title
title.info: Leave empty to show the product title.

vendor.paragraph: It will show like this when both selected: Vendor Vendor name

show_product_rating.label: Show product ratings
show_product_rating.info: The ratings will be automatically shown from your review app!

layout_mobile.label: Layout
layout_mobile.info: This changes the position of the product title based on the main product image.

settings.paragraph: Quantity rules is only available for Shopify Plus merchants. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/b2b/catalogs/quantity-pricing)
settings.paragraph-2: A placeholder text will be shown in the theme editor. The text will be replaced by the actual quantity rules when the product is published.

settings.paragraph: Volume pricing is only available for Shopify Plus merchants. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/b2b/catalogs/quantity-pricing)
settings.paragraph-2: A placeholder text will be shown in the theme editor. The text will be replaced by the actual volume pricing when the product is published.

show_read_more.label: Show a 'read more' link which scrolls to the product description

settings.paragraph: Check out the general theme settings to set up a custom short description. You can find the settings under the tab named 'Products'.

text.label: Custom short description
text.info: Leave empty to show the default short description title.

settings.paragraph: You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Products'.

is_child_product.label: Add to cart as a child product
is_child_product.info: The upsell product will be linked to the main product, for example when adding giftwrapping or extended warranty.

visible_products.label: Show products
visible_products.info: Only applicable when more than one product is selected.

show_title.label: Show product title
show_title.info: Only applicable when only one product is selected.

custom_label.label: Label
custom_label.info: The text to show instead of the product title

variant_in_popup.label: Show variants in popup
variant_in_popup.info: This will open a ‘Choose variant’ popup, instead of a variant selector in the product card.

min_stock.label: Show urgency bar when the variant inventory is below
min_stock.info: The stock urgency bar will only show if the stock level is below this amount. Or use metafields below.

min_stock_meta.label: Metafield stock
min_stock_meta.info: This will override ‘show urgency bar when the variant inventory is below’, above. Learn how to use this metafield [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/metafields).

show_level.label: Show variant's current stock amount
show_level.info: This will show the current stock amount in the urgency bar. Tip: you can also use the variable *inventory* in your text below.

show_bar_unavailable.label: Show bar when variant stock is 0 or below
show_bar_unavailable.info: When stock is empty, you can choose to show an empty bar or hide it. When showing it, use the out of stock message below.

show_bar_available_nostock.label: Show bar when variant is out of stock and still purchasable.
show_bar_available_nostock.info: Show bar when the product variant is 0 or below 0 and 'Continue selling when out of stock' checkbox is on in product settings in Shopify admin.

gradient_progressbar.label: Stock urgency bar gradient
gradient_progressbar.info: Gradient overrules the solid background color.

background_progress_bar.label: Progress bar color
background_progress_bar.info: This is the background color of the progress bar.

message.label: Stock message text
message.info: Use the variable *inventory* to show your current stock level, like shown above in the default message.

options.label: Enable separate option pickers
options.info: [Combined listing](https://apps.shopify.com/combined-listings) products and products with more than 250 variants will always show separate option pickers.

show_unavailable_variants.label: Show unavailable variants
show_unavailable_variants.info: Unavailable variants can only be hidden when separate option pickers are not applicable for the product.

show_single_options.label: Show options with only one variant

enable_selling_plans.label: Enable subscriptions
enable_selling_plans.info: For more information on how to set up subscriptions [click here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/purchase-options/subscriptions).

settings.paragraph: You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Trustbadge'.
You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Shipping and delivery'.

title_size.info: Only applicable when 'Show in accordion' is disabled

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Icon uses highlight color for accents.

header_image_svg.label: Use .svg format
header_image_svg.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

content.paragraph: All content can be filled static or with metafields. All content can be used seperate or together in this block. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208042-productpage)

show_contact_form.label: Show contact form
show_contact_form.info: A standard contact form will appear below the content.

settings.paragraph: This block only works with the Shopify Search & Discovery app. If no additional products are set, placeholder products will be shown (only in the theme editor). To select complementary products add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Icon uses highlight color for accents.

header_image_svg.label: Use .svg format
header_image_svg.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

products_layout.paragraph: If used, show the following information on the productcards.

show_dynamic_buybutton.label: Show dynamic buy button
show_dynamic_buybutton.info: Customers will see their preferred payment method, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/dynamic-checkout)

button_style_dynamic_buybutton.label: Dynamic buy button styling
button_style_dynamic_buybutton.info: Not applicable for all dynamic buy buttons.

preorder.label: Show pre-order button
preorder.info: This shows a pre-order button as buy button. Only applicable when product has 'continue selling when out of stock' setting active.

preorder_label.label: Delivery label
preorder_label.info: Add a delivery message to the pre-order button with metafields or general text content. If you want to show this information in your order mails, click [here](https://community.shopify.com/c/shopify-design/product-pages-get-customization-information-for-products/td-p/616503) for documentation.

preorder_show_dynamic_buybutton.label: Show dynamic buy button for pre-orders

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

filter_menu.label: Menu
filter_menu.info: A menu which will be used to display related collections. Click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208044-collections) for more info on how to build this menu.

collections_menu.label: Collections
collections_menu.info: Select related collections and/or choose a menu above. Duplicate items will be hidden automatically.

filters_show_more_limit.label: Enable 'Show more' link after amount of filters

filter_swatches.paragraph: For more information on how to set up visual filters [click here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters).

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

title.label: Custom title
title.info: Leave empty to show the collection title.

text.label: Custom description
text.info: Leave empty to show the collection description.

products_per_row.label: Products per row
products_per_row.info: Only applicable for the product card layout 'Grid'.

filter_menu.label: Menu
filter_menu.info: A menu which will be used to display collections. Click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208044-collections) for more info on how to build this menu.

collections_menu.label: Collections
collections_menu.info: Select related collections and/or choose a menu above. Duplicate items will be hidden automatically.

filters_show_more_limit.label: Enable 'Show more' link after amount of filters

filter_swatches.paragraph: For more information on how to set up visual filters [click here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters).

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

products_per_row_mobile.label: Products per row
products_per_row_mobile.info: Only applicable for the product card layout 'Grid'.

max_width.label: Content maximum width
max_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the content will be full width.

title.label: Custom heading
title.info: Leave empty to show the blog title.

show_banner.label: Show title in full width banner
show_banner.info: This will show your title in a banner over the Blog post featured image.

show_dynamic_buybutton.label: Show dynamic buy button
show_dynamic_buybutton.info: Customers will see their preferred payment method, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/dynamic-checkout)

terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

settings.paragraph: You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Shipping and delivery'.
Customize your form texts in the theme translations. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/language/translate-theme)

custom_checkbox_text.label: Label for the checkbox
custom_checkbox_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

image.label: Background
image.info: For best results with full background setting, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/6208050-404-page)

svg_logo.label: Use .svg format
svg_logo.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

settings.paragraph: Customize your message in the 'Preferences' section of your Online Store. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/password-page#add-password-protection-to-your-online-store)
Customize your form texts in the theme translations. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/language/translate-theme)
Customize your form texts in the theme translations. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/language/translate-theme)

svg_logo.label: Use .svg format
svg_logo.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

show_logo_giftcard.label: Show logo / shop name on the giftcard
